TopicTitle: EVA Jetpack "Chase Cam" -- "W" and "S" both apply downward rotation

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Ryzen 7 | GPU: RTX 3080 | RAM: 64GB

 

When in EVA and RCS on - 

Hitting "W" and "S" (Forward and backward movement for Kerbals.) functions properly in normal camera modes

Here's the problem:
Specifically in "CHASE CAM" - hitting "W" and "S" both also apply a forward roll instead of being a pure "forward / backwards" thrust vector. 

See the attached video (the specific issue is demonstrated around 40 seconds)
NOTE - I use "I" as the input to realign the Kerbal to the horizon then as I press "W", it behaves as if I was also pressing the "K" key which I was not as you can see from my input display
